item.title: Fitness & Health - Reducing Your Age
item.description:
Introduction

Death is a mystery. It is a scary darkness that is almost impossible to fanthom. If life is like a game, some people think that you would respawn in a different place, some people think that you replay the good bits of life in your brain over again, some people think that you enter a different dimension.

item.title: Simply Said - Weight Loss
item.description:
Introduction

Losing weight can be painfu and may seem impossible for some others. Even something as simple as counting calories can be exhausting. Been there, done that, backfired and ruined. I proceeded to explore betters ways to lose weight, below includes some of the measures that I have chanced upon that helps you to lose weight without losing your life and sense of self.
